## Bio

Mario De Toma is both an IT manager and a data scientist, an R programming tutor and, at the same time, a learner climbing impassable learning curves. 
Mario's background includes almost 20 years working as project and service manager in IT consulting and service corporations.

Mario is passionate about mathematical and computational thinking.
On this site he keeps a list of his [publications](publications.qmd) about computational and data science.
